tool.name: VCF to GFF3
tool.help:
This tool provides a simple conversion from vcf to gvf.
It is intended for use with Freebayes or with Samtools mpileup
Be sure to read the documentation to determine if it meets your requirements.
* vcf documentation at http://samtools.sourceforge.net/samtools.shtml#6 * GVF/GFF3 at http://www.sequenceontology.org/resources/gvf.html * Freebayes https://github.com/ekg/freebayes
